name: Emma is Offline
description:
A young woman of about 17 years was found dead the swimming pool of its property, the morning of this Monday (29)

According to local police, the victim  found flame Emma Jackson. The information gathered by the police is that Emma was arguing with someone. In the place was found the car of its brother, Alex that is missing since yesterday Sunday (28).

After verifying the disappearance, the police are investigating Alex's computer, looking for possible evidence of his disappearance and death of emma
